rituals.name: Suspension Pause — TS-08405
rituals.plain:
quiet field: Drop the shoulders. Set 2 minutes. Start now.
quiet fields: Let the breath fall. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
settling: Name three sensations. Stay for 5 minutes. Stop at timer.
Check body. Label it and release. Return once.
Do one more. Step outside briefly. Keep it small.
Close gently. End with one breath. Mark next time.
Why: Settling lowers load; suspension creates room.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.
